sqlMap.select: select * ,(select namec from sys_user where id=t.priceuserid) as priceuserids ,t.pieceother||'('||(SELECT dc.code FROM dat_cntype dc WHERE dc.id::TEXT = t.cntypeothercode)||')' AS pieceCntypeo ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername ,(select count(DISTINCT f.jobid) from fina_arap f where f.isdelete = false and f.fkid = t.id) AS totaljobs FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $corpfilter$ $filter$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY pod,pol,shipping,shipline,datefm,dateto ,daterelease desc LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $corpfilter$ $filter$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername ,f_price_air_getcostdesc('id='||t.id) AS costair ,(SELECT abbr from sys_corporation WHERE isairline = TRUE AND isdelete = false AND id = t.carrierid) AS carrier ,(SELECT abbr from sys_corporation WHERE isagent = TRUE AND isdelete = false AND id = t.bkagentid) AS bkagent FROM price_air t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_air t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,t.id AS fclid , ph.id AS homepageid ,ph.cost20 AS cost20p, ph.cost40gp AS cost40gpp, ph.cost40hq AS cost40hqp ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _price_fcl t ,price_homepage ph WHERE $qry$ AND isvalid = 'R' AND isrelease = true AND isdelete = false AND t.id = ph.priceid ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _price_fcl t ,price_homepage ph WHERE $qry$ AND isvalid = 'R' AND isrelease = true AND isdelete = false AND t.id = ph.priceid

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ AND isvalid = 'R' AND isrelease = true AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod
select count(*) AS counts FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ AND isvalid = 'R' AND isrelease = true AND isdelete = false

SELECT *, (select namec from sys_user where id=T.priceuserid) as priceuserids ,(SELECT x.bargedatefm FROM price_fcl x where x.id = T.id LIMIT 1) AS bargedatefm ,(SELECT x.bargedateto FROM price_fcl x where x.id = T.id LIMIT 1) AS bargedateto ,REPLACE(pricetotal, f_newline() , ' ') as pricetotal2 FROM f_rpa_qryfcl_table('$args$') AS T WHERE $filter$ $ord$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$;
SELECT 10000 AS counts;

SELECT * FROM ( select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername ,(SELECT airflight from price_air WHERE isdelete = false AND id = t.id) AS airflight ,(SELECT abbr from sys_corporation s,price_air a WHERE s.isairline = TRUE AND s.isdelete = false AND s.id = a.carrierid AND a.id = t.id) AS carrier ,(SELECT pol from price_air WHERE isdelete = false AND id = t.id) AS pol ,(SELECT pod from price_air WHERE isdelete = false AND id = t.id) AS pod FROM f_price_air('') t ) AS p WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $history$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

select count(*) AS counts FROM (select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername ,(SELECT airflight from price_air WHERE isdelete = false AND id = t.id) AS airflight ,(SELECT abbr from sys_corporation s,price_air a WHERE s.isairline = TRUE AND s.isdelete = false AND s.id = a.carrierid AND a.id = t.id) AS carrier ,(SELECT pol from price_air WHERE isdelete = false AND id = t.id) AS pol ,(SELECT pod from price_air WHERE isdelete = false AND id = t.id) AS pod FROM f_price_air('') t ) AS p WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $history$
select * ,(SELECT abbr FROM sys_corporation i WHERE i.id = t.customerid ) AS customerabbr FROM bus_price t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM bus_price t WHERE $qry$

select * ,(CASE WHEN level = '*' THEN '★' WHEN level = '**' THEN '★★' WHEN level = '***' THEN '★★★' WHEN level = '****' THEN '★★★★' WHEN level = '*****' THEN '★★★★★' END) AS level2 FROM price_fcl_pubrule ph WHERE $qry$ AND ruletype = 'T'
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_fcl_pubrule WHERE $qry$ AND ruletype = 'T'

select * ,t.pieceother||'('||(SELECT dc.code FROM dat_cntype dc WHERE dc.id::TEXT = t.cntypeothercode)||')' AS pieceCntypeo ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,t.pieceother||'('||(SELECT dc.code FROM dat_cntype dc WHERE dc.id::TEXT = t.cntypeothercode)||')' AS pieceCntypeo ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,((SELECT COUNT(priceid) FROM price_group_refprice x WHERE x.groupid = t.id) || '/' || (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM price_fcl y WHERE y.isdelete = FALSE))AS pricetcount ,((SELECT COUNT(userid) FROM price_group_refuser x WHERE x.groupid = t.id) || '/' || (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user y WHERE y.iscsuser = FALSE AND y.isdelete = FALSE AND y.isinvalid = TRUE)) AS usercount FROM price_group t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY code,name
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_group t WHERE $qry$
select * FROM sys_user t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND isadmin = 'N' ORDER BY corper,depter,jobdesc,code
select count(*) AS counts FROM sys_user t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND isadmin = 'N'

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refprice x WHERE groupid = $libid$ AND x.priceid = t.id) ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refprice x WHERE groupid = $libid$ AND x.priceid = t.id)
select * FROM price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refprice x WHERE groupid = $libid$ AND x.priceid = t.id) ORDER BY daterelease desc ,pol,pod
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_fcl t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refprice x WHERE groupid = $libid$ AND x.priceid = t.id)

SELECT * FROM _sys_user t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND isadmin = 'N' AND iscsuser = FALSE AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refuser x WHERE x.groupid = $libid$ AND x.userid = t.id) ORDER BY corpid,depter2,isinvalid DESC, code

select count(*) AS counts FROM _sys_user t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false AND isadmin = 'N' AND iscsuser = FALSE AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refuser x WHERE x.groupid = $libid$ AND x.userid = t.id)

select * FROM _sys_user t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND isadmin = 'N' AND iscsuser = FALSE AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refuser x WHERE x.groupid = $libid$ AND x.userid = t.id) ORDER BY corpid,depter2,isinvalid DESC, code

select count(*) AS counts FROM _sys_user t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false AND isadmin = 'N' AND iscsuser = FALSE AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM price_group_refuser x WHERE x.groupid = $libid$ AND x.userid = t.id)

SELECT * FROM ( select * ,(select shipping from price_fcl_bargefee where id = b.bargefeeid) AS shipping FROM price_fcl_bargefeedtl b ) AS t WHERE $qry$ $corpfilter$ $filter$ ORDER BY convert_to(area,'GBK'),polnamee LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM ( select * ,(select shipping from price_fcl_bargefee where id = b.bargefeeid) AS shipping FROM price_fcl_bargefeedtl b ) AS t WHERE $qry$ $corpfilter$ $filter$
SELECT * ,(CASE WHEN cntypeid > 0 THEN amtother ELSE 0 END) AS amtotherv FROM f_price_fcl_feeadd_filter($args$) WHERE $qry$ $filter$ ORDER BY id
select 10000 AS counts
select * FROM price_fcl_feeadd t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ ORDER BY id
select 10000 AS counts
SELECT * FROM ( select * ,(select shipping from price_fcl_bargefee where id = b.bargefeeid) AS shipping FROM price_fcl_bargefeedtl b ) AS t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY polnamee
SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM ( select * ,(select shipping from price_fcl_bargefee where id = b.bargefeeid) AS shipping FROM price_fcl_bargefeedtl b ) AS t WHERE $qry$

SELECT * ,(SELECT code FROM dat_cntype WHERE id = x.cntypeid) cntynamec FROM price_fcl_feeadd x WHERE $qry$ AND COALESCE(templatename,'')<>'' AND isdelete = false AND istemplate = TRUE ORDER BY templatename LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM price_fcl_feeadd x WHERE $qry$ AND COALESCE(templatename,'')<>'' AND isdelete = false AND istemplate = TRUE

SELECT b.* FROM fina_jobs b, price_fcl p, fina_arap f WHERE $qry$ AND b.id = f.jobid AND p.id = f.fkid AND p.id = $priceid$ AND b.isdelete = false AND p.isdelete = false AND f.isdelete = false ORDER BY nos

SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM fina_jobs b, price_fcl p, fina_arap f WHERE $qry$ AND b.id = f.jobid AND p.id = f.fkid AND P.id = $priceid$ AND b.isdelete = false AND p.isdelete = false AND f.isdelete = false

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername ,(SELECT namee FROM dat_port WHERE isdelete = false and code = t.pol limit 1) AS polnamee ,(SELECT namee FROM dat_port WHERE isdelete = false and code = t.pod limit 1) AS podnamee FROM price_train t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterrelease desc ,pol,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_train t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername ,(SELECT namee FROM dat_port WHERE isdelete = false and code = t.pol limit 1) AS polnamee ,(SELECT namee FROM dat_port WHERE isdelete = false and code = t.pod limit 1) AS podnamee FROM price_train t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $history$ AND isdelete = false AND isrelease = true
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_train t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $history$ AND isdelete = false AND isrelease = true

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM price_train_lcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterrelease desc ,pol,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_train_lcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM price_train_lcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $history$ AND isdelete = false AND isrelease = true
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_train_lcl t WHERE $qry$ $pol$ $pod$ $history$ AND isdelete = false AND isrelease = true

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM price_truck t WHERE $qry$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY daterrelease desc ,pod LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_truck t WHERE $qry$ $pod$ AND isdelete = false

select * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM price_truck t WHERE $qry$ $pod$ $history$ AND isdelete = false
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_truck t WHERE $qry$ $pod$ $history$ AND isdelete = false
select * FROM sys_corporation t WHERE $qry$ AND iscarrier = TRUE AND isdelete = false and remarks is not null and remarks !='' LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(1) as counts FROM sys_corporation t WHERE $qry$ AND iscarrier = TRUE AND isdelete = false and remarks is not null and remarks !=''
SELECT * ,(CASE WHEN cntypeid > 0 THEN amtother ELSE 0 END) AS amtotherv FROM f_price_fcl_feeadd_filter($args$) WHERE $qry$ $filter$ ORDER BY id
select 10000 AS counts
SELECT * ,(SELECT String_agg(namec,',') FROM dat_line WHERE code = ANY(regexp_split_to_array(lines,','))) AS linenamec FROM price_fcl_pubrule t WHERE $qry$
select count(*) AS counts FROM price_fcl_pubrule WHERE $qry$
